comment: Dr. Sheldon was such a nice professor and I loved her class. It was easy, just make sure to read the chapter(s) from the textbook before each class so you are prepared for a class discussion. Attendance is mandatory, but you have 3 days excused. There were 5 things total she graded by and they were fine, just do the work and participate!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Gives good feedback

comment: I TOOK HER FOR 2130! I absolutely loved this class. I took her over the summer, and she was quick to email back; and it was movie and reading heavy. The exams were written, but you can use your notes. They weren't difficult at all. All the movies were incredibly interesting. I highly recommend this professor for English 2130.

Contribute to the discussions each class and be knowledgeable of the texts. I did a mixture of skimming and sparknotes; it's a lot of reading. What really matters is the final paper, which she's super helpful with. Wants you to do well. Max 3 absences, each after that is 5 points off your final grade. I would have gotten an A but for that.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Like in any English class, she gives a lot of reading assignments. We do use a tiny Literary Theory book, which you can rent super cheap. She's nice and encourages students to think and discuss new ideas. I enjoyed our class discussions even though I'm not a "discussion person". She's always available, provides great feedback, and will work w/ you.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: She's one of the best professors I've taken and she makes film class incredibly interesting and I absolutely loved her. You don't need the textbook at all. I wouldn't even buy it honestly. She's amazing though!! Please take her!

This was the 2nd course I took with Sheldon and I'm taking 2 more with her next Fall. Best Film teacher at KSU by far, and I've taken several. If you are a Film minor or REALLY care about learning she is the teacher to take. There is a midterm, final, pp presentation, and paper, no HW. If you come to class and pay attention they're all super easy!

Her teachers are rather boring for a subject that needs a little pick me up. She lets her own opinion affect all the readings so expect the same story over and over. If you are an english major you may enjoy this class but any other is a no.
